original_text: After that, Abraham's servant left to go on his journey. He took with him ten of his master's camels. He also took many different kinds of valuable gifts that Abraham had given to him. He travelled towards Aram Naharaim. He arrived in the town of Nahor.
korean_text: 이에 종이 그 주인의 낙타 중 열 필을 끌고 떠났는데 곧 그의 주인의 모든 좋은 것을 가지고 떠나 메소보다미아로 가서 나홀의 성에 이르러

sentences.original_text: He took with him ten of his master's camels
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 주인의 낙타 열 마리를 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: He also took many different kinds of valuable gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 여러 종류의 귀중한 선물을 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: that Abraham had given to him
He arrived in the town of Nahor
